pages.title: Treasure Rooms
pages.text: Chances are that you bump into a locked room inside The Vault. Behind the fancy but sturdy door is a $(l)Treasure Room$(). $(br)A treasure room can be opened with the corresponding treasure key to reveal its treasure inside.
Inside the room is a $(l)Treasure Chest$() and piles of $(l)Treasure Sand$(). Mining Treasure Sand has a small chance of dropping a Vault Gem.
